title: My monitor shuts down after 5 minutes of gameplay with a buzzing sound :s??
body: It seems that whenever i'm playing league my monitor just goes completely black after 5 minutes of gameplay yet my computer is still on and i'll receive a buzzing noise. my computer will work fine no problems whatsoever but the second i play a game it messes up within 5. any tech's have an idea on the issue?

replies.body:
Hmmm, it sounds like this is caused by the *Game DVR* feature inside the Windows Game Bar. This has been causing freezes and FPS issues for some players on Windows 10. I'd recommend disabling this feature by following [this guide.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)

Let me know if this helped.

It had infact seemed to start doing it once i updated to windows 10,read something online that suggested to change my maximum processor state from 100% to 80% and 2 games in so far it seems to be doing the trick, i haven't logged into my xbox on my computer before though so  would what you were talking about  still be active? going to play a few games tonight to see how it goes, if it messes up i'll be sure to try your idea forsure!
